verses.verse: Come <S%H7126>near<s%>, ye <S%H1471>nations<s%>, to <S%H8085>hear<s%>; and <S%H7181>hearken<s%>, ye <S%H3816>peoples<s%>: let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393>thereof<s%>; the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and all things that come forth from <S%H6631>it<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7110>indignation<s%> against all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2534>wrath<s%> against all their <S%H6635>host<s%>: he hath utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, he hath delivered them to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>.

Their <S%H2491>slain<s%> also shall be cast <S%H7993>out<s%>, and the <S%H889>stench<s%> of their dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>melted<s%> with their <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall be <S%H4743>dissolved<s%>, and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall be rolled <S%H1556>together<s%> as a <S%H5612>scroll<s%>; and all their <S%H6635>host<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, as the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> fadeth from <S%H5034>off<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and as a <S%H5034>fading<s%> leaf from the <S%H8384>fig-tree<s%>.

For my <S%H2719>sword<s%> hath <S%H7301>drunk<s%> its fill in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: <S%H3381>behold<s%>, it shall come down upon <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and upon the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H2764>curse<s%>, to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, it is made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H2459>fatness<s%>, with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%> and <S%H6260>goats<s%>, with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

And the <S%H7214>wild-oxen<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6499>them<s%>, and the bullocks with the <S%H47>bulls<s%>: and their <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H7301>drunken<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and their <S%H6083>dust<s%> made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H2459>fatness<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, a <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7966>recompense<s%> for the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And the <S%H5158>streams<s%> of Edom shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2203>pitch<s%>, and the <S%H6083>dust<s%> thereof into <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> thereof shall become <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H2203>pitch<s%>.

It shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> nor <S%H3119>day<s%>; the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> thereof shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> it shall lie <S%H2717>waste<s%>; none shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> it for <S%H5331>ever<s%> and <S%H5331>ever<s%>.

But the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7090>porcupine<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3244>it<s%>; and the owl and the <S%H6158>raven<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H5186>therein<s%>: and he will stretch over it the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion<s%>, and the <S%H68>plummet<s%> of <S%H922>emptiness<s%>.
They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> thereof to the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, but none shall be <S%H8269>there<s%>; and all its princes shall be <S%H657>nothing<s%>.

And <S%H5518>thorns<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> in its <S%H759>palaces<s%>, <S%H7057>nettles<s%> and <S%H2336>thistles<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> <S%H5116>thereof<s%>; and it shall be a habitation of <S%H8577>jackals<s%>, a <S%H2681>court<s%> for <S%H1323>ostriches<s%>.

And the wild beasts of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> shall <S%H6298>meet<s%> with the <S%H338>wolves<s%>, and the wild <S%H8163>goat<s%> shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>; <S%H3917>yea<s%>, the night-monster shall <S%H7280>settle<s%> <S%H4672>there<s%>, and shall find her a place of <S%H7280>rest<s%>.

There shall the <S%H7091>dart-snake<s%> make her <S%H7077>nest<s%>, and <S%H4422>lay<s%>, and <S%H1234>hatch<s%>, and <S%H1716>gather<s%> under her <S%H6738>shade<s%>; <S%H1772>yea<s%>, there shall the kites be <S%H6908>gathered<s%>, every <S%H802>one<s%> with her <S%H7468>mate<s%>.

Seek ye <S%H1875>out<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H7121>read<s%>: no <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>these<s%> shall be <S%H5737>missing<s%>, <S%H802>none<s%> shall <S%H6485>want<s%> her <S%H7468>mate<s%>; for my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, it hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, it hath gathered <S%H6908>them<s%>.

And he hath <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for <S%H3027>them<s%>, and his hand hath <S%H2505>divided<s%> it unto them by <S%H6957>line<s%>: they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they dwell <S%H7931>therein<s%>.
